recipe.title: Roasted Baby Potatoes with Capers and Rosemary
ingredients: 3 pounds assorted baby potatoes (such as red-skinned, White Rose, and baby purple), halved
3 sprigs fresh rosemary, each broken into 4 pieces plus more for garnish
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Arrange potatoes in single layer on large rimmed baking sheet. Drizzle with oil; sprinkle with rosemary pieces, garlic, and salt; toss to coat. Roast until potatoes are tender, stirring every 15 minutes, about 45 minutes total. Mix in capers. Roast until flavors blend, about 5 minutes longer. Season with pepper. Transfer to bowl. Garnish with rosemary sprigs.
